TEXT.TITLE: BRAZILIAN INFLATION LOWER IN FEBRUARY
TEXT.BODY: Brazilian consumer prices rose 13.9 pct in February, compared to January's record rate of 16.8 pct, the Brazilian Geography and Statistics Institute said in a statement. The February rise brought the increase in consumer prices since the introduction of the anti-inflation Cruzado Plan a year ago to 62.5 pct. Reuter
